sys_atf_test.description:
Test the navigation module for all user roles.
-- Create Users -- 1. Get Current User sys_id 2. Create new user named "TimeSheet Test" 3. Select any user without a role (Deactivated) 4. Impersonate TimeSheet Test (No current roles)
-- Test User without roles -- 5. Verify Time Tracking Application Menu is not visible. 6. Verify All Time Tracking modules are not visible
-- Test user With User Role -- 7. Impersonate initiating Admin 8. Add Time Tracking User role to "TimeSheet Test" 9. Impersonate TimeSheet Test (User Role) 10. Confirm Time Tracking application is visible 11. Confirm Proper Modules are visible:
-- Test user with Approver role -- 12. Impersonate initiating Admin 13. Remove User Role from TimeSheet Test 14. Add Approver role to TimeSheet Test 15. Impersonate TimeSheet Test (Admin Role) 16. Confirm Time Tracking Application is visible 17. Confirm Appropriate Modules are visible.
-- Test user with Approver and User roles -- 18. Impersonate initiating Admin 19. Add User Role to TimeSheet Test (User and Approver) 20. Impersonate TimeSheet Test (User And Approver Role) 21. Confirm Time Tracking Application is visible 22. Confirm Appropriate Modules are visible.
-- Test user with Finance Role -- 23. Impersonate initiating Admin 24. Remove Approver Role 25. Remove User Role 26. Add Finance Role 27. Impersonate TimeSheet Test (Finance) 28. Confirm Time Tracking Application is visible 29. Confirm Appropriate Modules are visible.
-- Test Admin Role -- 30. Impersonate initiating Admin 31. Remove Finance Role 32. Add Time Sheet Admin role to TimeSheet Test 33. Impersonate TimeSheet Test 34. Confirm Time Tracking Application is visible 35. Confirm All Modules are visible.
sys_atf_test.name: Time Tracking Nav Module
